module.name: ODBC Admin
module.description: Allows configure OBDC of user administration.
module.changelog: *0.1* Build Interface, write to file by root access *0.2* odbc.ini conf + DB added *0.3* rebuild all structure, add init DB function for first install *0.3.1* support config res_odbc.conf *0.4* support config odbcinst.ini *0.6* bugs fixed *0.7* file writer function *0.8* check server status *0.9* support install ODBC, ASODBC *0.9.1* change GUI *0.9.4* change add MSSQL *0.9.6* fix bug on centos *0.9.7* fix bugs, change menu *0.9.8* auto setup odbc-asterisk on centos AsteriskNow *0.9.8.1* add some guide *0.9.8.2* add default dsn freepbx *0.9.9* fix bugs
